Adelina Iftene is a law professor at Schulich School of Law at Dalhousie University, where she teaches criminal law and prison law.
Dr. Adelina Iftene is an Associate Professor of Law and the Criminal Justice Specialization Coordinator at Schulich School of Law, Dalhousie University.
